languages.text: {n}Кощунственная машина погибает под вашим ударом, и Божество исходит в мир во всей свой мощи, мудрости и вечности. Оно оценивающе взирает на вас, а затем небрежной тенью мысли возносит к себе. Свершается обещанное — ущербная плоть трансмутируется, а жалкие человеческие чувства замещаются совершенством абсолютного восприятия вселенной, присущим Божеству.{/n}

{n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кощунственная машина погибает под вашим ударом, и Божество исходит в мир во всей свой мощи, мудрости и вечности. Оно оценивающе взирает на вас, а затем небрежной тенью мысли возносит к себе. Свершается обещанное — ущербная плоть трансмутируется, а жалкие человеческие чувства замещаются совершенством абсолютного восприятия вселенной, присущим Божеству.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine shatters under your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all its might, wisdom, and eternity. It looks at you appraisingly, and then, with a nonchalant shadow of a thought ascends you to itself. The promise is fulfilled — the inferior flesh is transmutatetd into the eternal metal, the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the absolute perfection of perception of the universe, intrinsic to a Deity.{/n}

{n}The sacrilegious machine shatters under your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all its might, wisdom, and eternity. It looks at you appraisingly, and then, with a nonchalant shadow of a thought ascends you to itself. The promise is fulfilled — the inferior flesh is transmutatetd into the eternal metal, the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the absolute perfection of perception of the universe, intrinsic to a Deity.{/n}

{n}The sacrilegious machine shatters under your hand and the Deity comes unto the world in all its might, wisdom, and eternity. It eyeballs you and then, with a nonchalant glimmer of a thought, ascends you to itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and pathetic human feelings are replaced with the perfection of the absolute perception of the universe, intrinsic to a Deity.{/n}

{n}The sacrilegious machine shatters under your hand and the Deity comes unto the world in all its might, wisdom, and eternity. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and pathetic human feelings are replaced with the perfection of the absolute perception of the universe, intrinsic to a Deity.{/n}

It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La machine sacrilège se brise sous votre coup et la Divinité apparaît dans toute sa puissance, Sa sagesse et Son éternité. Elle vous jauge du regard puis, avec une bribe de pensée, vous élève à Son niveau. La promesse est respectée : la chair inférieure est transmutée et les pitoyables sentiments humains sont remplacés par la perfection de la perception absolue de l'univers, intrinsèque de la Divinité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La machine sacrilège se brise sous votre coup et la divinité apparaît dans toute sa puissance, sa sagesse et son éternité. Elle vous jauge du regard puis, avec une bribe de pensée nonchalante, vous élève à son niveau. La promesse est respectée : la chair inférieure est transmutée et les pitoyables sentiments humains sont remplacés par la perfection d'une perception absolue de l'univers, intrinsèque d'une divinité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La máquina sacrílega cae a tus manos y la deidad entra al mundo con toda su fuerza, su sabiduría y su eternidad. Te examina y, con un jirón de pensamiento indiferente, te hace trascender a él. Su palabra está cumplida: la carne inferior se ha transmutado y las patéticas sensaciones humanas quedan reemplazadas por la sublime divinidad de la percepción absoluta del universo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La máquina sacrílega estalla bajo tu mano y la deidad entra al mundo con toda su fuerza, su sabiduría y su eternidad. Te mira y, con un jirón de pensamiento indiferente, te hace trascender a él. Su palabra está cumplida: la carne inferior se ha transmutado y las patéticas sensaciones humanas quedan reemplazadas por la perfección de la percepción absoluta del universo intrínseca a la deidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台亵渎神明的机器被你摧毁。神明带着祂全部的力量、智慧与永恒，降临到了这个世界。祂盯着你，随后仅仅通过一个虚无缥缈的念头，就将你同样擢升成了神明。祂履行了祂的诺言，你低等的肉体被彻底改变了，可怜的人类感知也被无数种更加完美的方式取代。你可以通过神明与生俱来的方式，完美地理解这个宇宙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台亵渎神明的机器被你砸成了碎片。神明带着祂全部的力量、智慧与永恒，降临到了这个世界。祂盯着你，随后仅仅是冷淡地笑了笑，就将你同样擢升成了神明。祂履行了祂的诺言，你低等的肉体被彻底改变了，可怜的人类感知也被无数种更加完美的方式取代。你可以通过神明与生俱来的方式，完美地理解这个宇宙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die frevelhafte Maschine zerspringt unter deiner Hand, und die Gottheit kommt in all ihrer Macht, Weisheit und Ewigkeit in die Welt. Sie untersucht dich und erhebt dich dann mit nur dem Geist eines Gedankens zu sich selbst. Das Versprechen ist erfüllt: Das niedere Fleisch wird verwandelt, erbärmliche menschliche Gefühle werden durch die Erhabenheit der absoluten Wahrnehmung des Universums ersetzt, die der Gottheit gegeben ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die frevelhafte Maschine zerspringt unter deiner Hand, und die Gottheit kommt in all ihrer Macht, Weisheit und Ewigkeit in die Welt. Sie mustert dich und erhebt dich dann mit einem beiläufigen Glimmern eines Gedankens zu sich selbst. Das Versprechen ist erfüllt: Das niedere Fleisch wird verwandelt, erbärmliche menschliche Gefühle werden durch die Perfektion der absoluten Wahrnehmung des Universums ersetzt, die einer Gottheit intrinsisch gegeben ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒涜的な機械があなたの手によって散り、神がその力、知恵、永遠性をもってこの世に現れる。それはあなたを見つめ、そして一抹の思いつきで、あなたを自身の元へと昇華させる。約束は果たされた。劣った肉体は変容し、哀れな人間の感情は神性に内在する絶対的な宇宙認識の崇高さに取って代わられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒涜的な機械があなたの手によって散り、神がその力、知恵、永遠性をもってこの世に現れる。それはあなたを見つめ、そして一抹の思いつきで、あなたを自身の元へと昇華させる。約束は果たされた。劣った肉体は変容し、哀れな人間の感情は神性に内在する絶対的な宇宙認識の崇高さに取って代わられる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hürmetsiz makine, ellerine düşüyor. Tanrı; tüm kudreti, bilgeliği ve ebedîliğiyle dünyaya geliyor. Seni inceliyor, akıl almaz bir şekilde seni kendine yükseltiyor. Vaat yerine getirildi: Aşağılık et dönüştü ve acınası insan duyguları, Tanrı'nın evrene dair eksiksiz algısının haşmetiyle değişti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrilegious machine falls at your hand, and the Deity comes unto the world in all Its might, wisdom, and eternity. It examines you and then, with but a ghost of a thought, elevates you to Itself. The promise is fulfilled: the inferior flesh is transmuted and the pathetic human feelings are replaced with the sublimity of the Deity's absolute perception of the universe.{/n}
